DOC.brief_summary: Genistein Combined Polysaccharide ( GCP ) may play role secondary chemopreventive agent treatment localized prostate cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Genistein Concentrated Polysaccharide ( GCP ) Prostate Cancer Active Surveillance .
DOC.criteria: Participants must male pathological diagnosis prostate cancer Pathological diagnosis prostate cancer must confirm file CRA prior study entry . No treatment ( surgery , radiation , hormone ) prior study entry . PSA 2.0 10.0 ng/ml . If PSA > 10.0 , patient must Active Surveillance 12 month prior study initiation . No known allergy soy soy product . The patient currently take 2 gram genistein day nutritional diet enhance supplement ( OTC supplement ) . Participant previous GCP clinical trial . Normal Chemistry value prior study entry . No pathological documentation prostate cancer . Prior treatment prostate cancer . PSA > 10.0 ng/ml Active Surveillance 12 month . Allergy soy soy product . Abnormal chemistry value .
